AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Stanley Pruszenski: United States Border Patrol agent involved in the traffic stop of a suspicious pickup truck camper on Interstate Highway 35, observed the vehicle and its occupants
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alfred Baron: United States Border Patrol agent involved in the traffic stop of a suspicious pickup truck camper on Interstate Highway 35, observed the vehicle and its occupants
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Lourdes Rangel-Campos: Driver of the camper, admitted to being a Mexican citizen without immigration documents
